channel.title: Comments on: The Podcasts I listen to (somewhat) regularly…

item.title: By: Andres
item.dc:creator: Andres
item.description:
I'm always on the look out for cool Canadian made content here my fave podcast destinations:
net@night with Amber and Leo http://www.twit.tv/natn66
The All You Need is Cheese Podcast http://www.allyouneedischeese.ca/podcast
CBC Podcasts http://www.cbc.ca/podcasting
Canada Podcast http://www.canadapodcasts.ca/
Six Pixels of Separation (Marketing Guru's Mitch Joel ) http://www.twistimage.com/blog/podcast/
item.content:encoded:
I’m always on the look out for cool Canadian
made content here my fave podcast destinations:

http://www.twit.tv/natn66

Six Pixels of Separation (Marketing Guru’s Mitch Joel )
http://www.twistimage.com/blog/podcast/

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description: Maybe I'll give hanselminutes.com a try. I do occasionally read his blog... thanks for the suggestion!
item.content:encoded: Maybe I’ll give hanselminutes.com a try. I do occasionally read his blog… thanks for the suggestion!

item.title: By: scheffler
item.dc:creator: scheffler
item.description:
Gotta admit, I look forward each week to the TWiT update from LaPorte. I find myself laughing out loud on the way to/from work.
Another of my must listens is hanselminutes.com. He's a very good interviewer and does an excellent job of summarizing points along the way.
item.content:encoded:
Gotta admit, I look forward each week to the TWiT update from LaPorte. I find myself laughing out loud on the way to/from work.

Another of my must listens is hanselminutes.com. He’s a very good interviewer and does an excellent job of summarizing points along the way.
